# airbyte_source_instatus (Data Source)

SourceInstatus DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "airbyte_source_instatus" "my_source_instatus" {
  secret_id = "...my_secretId..."
  source_id = "...my_sourceId..."
}
```
